personalInfo.name: Freddy Suarez
personalInfo.title: Senior/Lead QA Automation Engineer
personalInfo.bio: Senior SDET with 5+ years experience in test automation. Expert in TypeScript, Playwright, Java, and API testing. Proven leadership driving CI/CD implementation and software quality through strategic testing. Quick adopter of new technologies.

projects.title: E2E Automation Framework
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive end-to-end testing framework using TypeScript and Playwright. The framework included parallel test execution, detailed reporting, and cross-browser compatibility.

projects.title: API Testing Framework
projects.description: Maintained a robust API testing solution using Java, Cucumber, and Rest Assured for a fintech payment solution. Implemented monitoring for critical endpoints that improved incident response time.

projects.title: Custom Test Automation Framework
projects.description: Maintained and enhanced robust test automation frameworks using C#/Java with Selenium WebDriver. Created reusable components to improve framework maintainability, resulting in faster test creation and more reliable test execution across multiple environments.

education.degree: ISTQB Certified Tester Advanced Level - Technical Test Analyst
education.description: Advanced certification in technical test analysis techniques and methodologies.
Certification covering fundamental concepts and principles of software testing.
Professional training in Java development, including frameworks and best practices.
Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering, providing a strong analytical foundation.

experience.description:
• Led TypeScript & Playwright implementation, reducing test time and improving cross-browser coverage
• Architected E2E automation framework with TypeScript/Playwright to ensure comprehensive test coverage
• Implemented CI/CD with Harness for automated test execution across environments
• Mentored SDETs, conducting code reviews and TypeScript best practices training
• Collaborated with product owners to align test strategies with business objectives

• Developed API testing framework using Java, Cucumber, and Rest Assured
• Implemented TypeScript monitoring for critical API endpoints, improving incident response time
• Automated test execution in cloud environments using Docker
• Enhanced reporting systems with Google Chat Group notifications

• Created custom test frameworks with C#/Java and Selenium WebDriver
• Built reusable test components to improve framework maintainability
• Developed RESTful APIs and UI using Java, Spring Boot, React, and PostgreSQL

testimonials.text: I highly recommend Freddy as a sr. SDET or Testing Lead. Having had the pleasure of working closely with Freddy, I can attest to his exceptional skills, dedication, and leadership abilities in the realm of software testing and quality assurance. During his time on my team, he consistently demonstrated a deep understanding of software development methodologies, testing techniques, and quality assurance best practices. Freddy was instrumental in developing and implementing comprehensive testing strategies that significantly improved product quality and reduced defects.
testimonials.author: Team Lead

testimonials.text: I have had the pleasure of working with Freddy Suarez for over a year on one of the critical initiatives. He is a very talented and skilled QA automation engineer for both UI/UX and API automation. He has a unique ability of understanding the business requirements and driving the automation strategy and shares his ideas with the team in arriving at solutions. He is very calm and gets to the source of the issues, takes ownership and implements the solution.
testimonials.author: Project Manager

metaTags.title: Freddy Suarez - Senior/Lead QA Automation Engineer
metaTags.description: Professional portfolio of Freddy Suarez, an experienced SDET specializing in test automation with TypeScript, Playwright, and Java
metaTags.keywords: QA automation, SDET, TypeScript, Playwright, Java, test automation, CI/CD, API testing
